thread.title: Guess who! Comedian shares adorable throwback snap and he's the cutest thing ever
thread.title_full: Guess who! Comedian shares adorable throwback snap and he's the cutest thing ever

author: Vicki Newman
title: Guess who! Comedian shares adorable throwback snap and he's the cutest thing ever
text:
Guess who! Comedian shares adorable throwback snap and he's the cutest thing ever Can you figure out who this cute blond-haired boy is? Share Can you guess who this blond-haired boy is? (Photo: Instagram/dwalliams) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
We love a childhood throwback snap - and this one is adorable! 
A comedian took to Instagram to share this amazing picture of himself as a little boy. 
We bet you can't guess who it is. 
Posing up alongside his sister, the blond-haired boy stares into the camera lens as he sits on a swing. 
His sister, wearing a pretty floral dress, holds on tight as she stands by him protectively. 
She flashes a smile but her brother has more of a Zoolander-style blue steel pose going on. Read More Brooklyn Beckham stands by his dad David with sweet throwback snap after email leak scandal Our mystery celeb poses up with his sister (Photo: Instagram/dwalliams) 
That didn't stay with him as he grew up though, the funnyman is rarely seen without a big grin on his face. 
It seems he was always a snappy dresser though. 
Wearing cream-coloured jeans and a dark red buttoned polo shirt, he looks smart as a dart. 
These days, we see him on the telly regularly looking just as dapper in a suit. 
A smart two-piece isn't all he wears for his telly appearances though. 
Some fans carried on the joke by asking which one he was in the picture or asking if he's the one in the dress. 
Guessed it yet? 
It's none other than Little Britain star and Britain's Got Talent judge David Walliams . It's David Walliams! (Photo: ITV) 
Who knew he used to be a blond? 
The star posted the throwback snap, joking: "Me & my sister yesterday." 
His fans couldn't get enough. 
"Omg, you were adorably funny looking!," wrote one. 
Another asked: "Are you sure this is you? And not Boris Johnson @dwalliams? Lovely pic, so cute! Great share" 
And another wrote: "Ur rockin the dress..the style it so suits u!!" [sic] Like us on Facebook
